ProductInfo.Features:
12MP Still Image Capture and Full 1080p HD Video
SteadyShot Image Stabilization Reduces Blur
Back-Illuminated Exmor R CMOS Sensor
Built-in Wi-Fi® and NFC for Remote Control and Viewing Via Smartphone
One-Touch NFC Smartphone Pairing
Built-in GPS Plots Location and Calculates Telemetry
Wide Angle Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Lens
6 Video Modes Including 1080/60p HD and 4x Slow Motion
Ultra Wide 170° Pro Quality Carl Zeiss® Vario-Tessar® Lens
Exmor R® CMOS Sensor for Excellent Low Light Performance
Hand Free Control and Remote Viewing (Optional Accessory)
Built-In Stereo Mic for Quality Sound Recording
WiFi Range Extender
Micro SD/SDHC and Memory Stick MicroTM Compatible
HDMI® Output for Easy File Transfer
Mac® & PC Compatible w/ Upload to Facebook®, YouTubeTM etc
ProductInfo.Name: Sony POV HD 1080p Wearable Camera with Carl Zeiss Lens and WiFi, GPS & NFC HDR-AS30V (16GB)
